input: A young man received a mysterious box from an old friend, containing a magical lamp. When he rubbed it, a genie appeared and offered him three wishes.
output: A young man was so excited when he received a special box from his old friend. Inside the box was a mysterious lamp. He rubbed the lamp, and suddenly a genie appeared. The genie said he could have three magical wishes - anything he wanted! The young man was very excited and couldn't believe his luck. He had a hard time deciding what to wish for but eventually managed to make his three wishes come true!
